content.rendered:
Welcome to Our Night Shift Cold Calling Team: At Quixotic Creatives], we are thrilled to welcome talented individuals to be part of our night shift cold calling team. As a Night Shift Cold Caller, you will be an essential link in connecting with potential clients, driving sales, and expanding our reach.

What You’ll Do:

  1. 1. Initiate outbound cold calls to prospects and effectively pitch our products/services to generate leads and sales opportunities.
  2. 2. Engage in active listening to understand customer needs and provide relevant information and solutions.
  3. 3. Maintain accurate records of all calls and update the CRM system to ensure seamless communication with the sales team.
  4. 4. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to optimize lead generation efforts and achieve team targets.
  5. 5. Embrace a positive and persuasive communication style to leave a lasting impression on potential customers.

Requirements

  1. 1. Proven experience as a Cold Caller or in a telemarketing role.
  2. 2. Strong communication and persuasion skills to engage effectively with potential clients.
  3. 3. Excellent phone etiquette and ability to handle objections with tact and confidence.
  4. 4. Comfortable working in a night shift environment, with the determination to excel and deliver exceptional results.
  5. 5. Basic computer skills and familiarity with CRM software would be advantageous but not mandatory.

Join Our Energetic Team:

If you thrive in a challenging and dynamic environment and are passionate about making impactful connections with customers, this opportunity is perfect for you. Join our night shift cold calling team and be part of a journey that shapes the future of our business and the lives of our clients. Take the next step in your career and apply now to embark on this exciting path with us!
